the downfall of your fandom by skuldchan
Username:
Fandom:
How it happened:God decreed that your fandom was awesome, and it thus ascended to heaven
XD Frikken awesome! Me n Jesus shootin' hookers!

Ain't life great? =D

Really, not sarcasm there.  I wore nothin' but brown today and that somehow gave me the power to talk in class (I know, it's actually psychological, but like golly-gee, It makes me just swell.

Yeah. That's about it.

And on a side-note: I don't like stayin' up late. When it gets late or I'm just tired, I think nasty, evil thoughts about nice people I love getting shot in the head and dieing when getting the mail and so on....so don't take it personally if I depart while in a convo. ;D
'I don't need help, I need time.'

--Don't read if you just ate...I guess. or if you don't like "disturbing" thoughts-- w/e


Anyway. Been braining again.
 We all cringe and pretend to puke when we see something like a man's hairy butt or see a face that has been burned away a bit. It's obvious that we see it as something amazingly gross.
But I've been thinking... why?
Why do we shun things without even CONSIDERING the mere possibility that the hairy butt or burned face is as much the same to everything as our own stupid little face & butt?

Well, I don't know. More on that later I guess.

Teens have gotten all "emo." Emo=Emotional -> Over-Emotional. They know they are. They think they are.
--Everyone life "stinks." LIVE.WITH.IT.OR.DIE.ALREADY stop talking 'bout how you'd like to die. If you truly were suicidal, your corpse would be rotting by now.  You are just like the gangsters. Making big deals about stupid things; not making any sense. Aww, did I make you feel bad? GET USED TO IT!

Teens, little kids, Adults, have gotten the idea they want to be "gangsta/gangster." Why? Why the fuck would you want to cut off 10...20...however many years off your life, just so you can wander around shooting people, stealing useless shit, having sex with dumbasses, smoking horse shit, robbing houses...then selling everything to buy more bull?
Guy "G's": Testosterone-overrun dicks.
Girl "Ho's": Greedy little whores.
--They deserve a good bullet through their own damn heads.

Preppy little jerks- OMG I can't believe daddy didn't get me a 40,000 dollar car for my 13th birthday D= At least my boyfriend who doesn't give a good god damn about me but says he does anyway can give me a ride ;D
--.....*BAM* Go to hell, asshole.

Jocks....
--well...enough said about that.

Homophobes- Nobody wants you anyway; gay nor straight. Go out back, and shoot yourself.

Quiet ones- Learn to speak up. People might pretend to like you, but a large percent of them don't know you. If ya like being alone, Go with it. But don't cry when you live your life alone.

Everyone- Keep your mind open and pay attention to that that will matter throughout your whole life; not just now. You can not understand understand anything without first understanding yourself. Cheesy, yes. Counselor-ish, no duh. But take the damn advice.

D= I feel so loooonelyy

 

 

 

 

 

NOW GIMME HUGS

Christian Rap, Metal, or regular ol' screeching the lord's name again and again and again?

Sorry, love that...erm...quote, I guess it's called. =P

Anywho. Haven't updated since my list of dislikes.

I've been addicted to Halo 2, Animal Crossing: Wild World, Megaman Battle Network 3 (white), Pokemon FireRed, and Pokemon Emerald lately.
I've also been listening to Tomb Raider music (from the 1st game)...takes me back to the days when I couldn't play games, and instead I told my sister where to go.
"Left! Now up! =D =D Bats! Bats! Kill the bats!!!11!"

Watched Scary Movie 4 the other day... I only liked the Saw spoofs. Everything else sucked. o.o  'Cept Leslie Nielson... he makes everything funny (wonder how old he is).

And in about 20 minutes, "Weird Al" Yankovic will be releasing the first single from his new album "Straight Outta Lynwood" right onto the intarnet. *fanboy squeal*

...That is all.

I hate when people are hypocritical.
I hate when people put down others because their life is "bad" so to speak.
I hate when people get pissed real easily.
I hate when people expect the world to revolve around them.
I hate when people yell.
I hate when people are selfish.
I hate when people hate their lives.
I hate when people don't look on the bright side.
I hate when people don't lighten up.
I hate when people blame, whether they did something or not.
I hate when people are unfair.
I hate when people are unhappy.

Yeah... so that stupid government of ours let me behind the wheel today for 2 1/2 hours =P And 3 more tomorrow XD

...
That is all.

For anyone who's watched Little Shop of Horrors

In other news, I burned EdibleCastle songs onto a CD yesterday   (the songs can be found on Newgrounds Audio, by searching for the artist EdibleCastle ((no spaces))... now I be having fun singing along.

My brother's having surgery on his back next Wednesday, and my mom's going to see him during it... So I'll be stuck in school and surrounded by the people that don't listen to eachother and yell/whine every minute they have the opportunity to (sister, neices, father)... while mommy's out in Illinois, the place I've been wanting to go back to for the past couple years. T-T

...got dammit, why the hell am I being so selfish... my brother has been just recently told he has diabetes and is having his first-ever-surgery and I'm sitting here complaining about how bad MY life is. I'm in paradise compared to him.

Screw it. I'm thinking positive for a while. I have food. I have a place to live. I have friends. I don't have diabetes, unlike my dad and brother. I am fucking happy!

... i know. positives. yeah, list of positives.

-no diabetes
-loving mom
-only allergy is rice
-I'm tall --> not picked on too much
------
Awright. I'm better. I'm cool... eghhhh... life iz good. Plus, I gotta go anyway.

My japanese name is 山田 Yamada (mountain field) 雄大 Masahiro (big hero).

Hehe. Hero. Saw link to it in Ruri's LJ. yeeeeey! Well...uh. Yeah. Tata! Oh yeah, I watched 'Dumb and Dumber' yesterday (the first one; the GOOD one). A dose of Jim C. always makes me feel happy.

T-T... Why the hell do I live with a father and a sister that act exactly the same, and fight about how what the other person does is stupid and wrong... damn hypocritical beings. I'm SO glad I take up on my mother's side.

Don't get me wrong, I love them. But that's no reason for me to like them.

The Story =D

I woke up to my cellphone ringing, but I couldn't answer it in time. Then, when I thought I was free to go back to bed, I got the same voicemail 4 times. It was from my mom. One of our cells screwed up somehow...
Then, I heard my dad yelling at my sister about how "He won't put up with this" from her... I wasn't really paying attention.  My sister started her Lion's Roar crying, so I turned on a Weird Al CD.
But then my damn stereo died (I gotta replace that thing). So, my mom called again and asked if there was anything I wanted her to pick up from work before she left. I said no...but now I regret it. <<;; I need want some more CD-Rs... But she did pick up $20 bucks for me since I'm going to a friend's place today. I don't think we're going anywhere, but I'm grateful either way.

So I'm here, now. Typing this entry.

I heard my sis saying dat my dad told her she needs to clean up her act or he might remove my neices from her posession... -.-
"If he does that, he may as well abondon Doug, since he dad does the same shit I do but to him"
My fucking God... Why the hell do I have to be brought into it?! I'm the one that tried staying out of it!! T-T

Hypocrites deserve nothing but death... But nooo, that's too easy. >={}

Let's see here. If a waffle eats a pancake, what would happen to the syrup? Would the syrup start an army and attack the waffle? But what if the waffle turns out to be a Hitler-waffle? Will it create camps in which little packs of butter walk around naked and die off by some strange disease? Would the waffle SPREAD the butter on bread just for the fun of it?

...and people LIKE breakfast....ugh.

SCIENCE VS GOD
To be honest, I wanted to be a scientist SO much when I was younger. But now, I realize science is just pure bull. Scientists 'find answers', even if it means playing God (Cloning, etc.).
The Lord does not like it too much, knowing his own image is betraying him.
For example, we now HAVE to genetically buff up turkeys to have those nice Thanksgiving ones due to too much "scientific experimentation." Meaning, hatching a regular turkey will only give us a crappy skinny thing.

Forgive me if I'm drawing conclusions here, but it seems to me as if God was prepared for this. I mean, we screwed with his creation. Now his creation is gonna kill us.

"...is gonna kill us." -->  Scientists are screwing around with EVERYTHING these days. They're cloning more plants than they actually grow in crops anymore... Many see this as a good thing.   We might be getting more food, but  this is really just a worldwide suicide.   Mr. Crichton showed that cloning is not a good thing in his book "Jurassic Park!"
"...cloning is not a good thing in his book "Jurassic Park! "-->  The cages were good. The dinosaurs were all female. Everything was fine.  But to their surprise, they fucked up somewhere along the road of creating dinosaurs. They used DNA from frogs...the ones that can change their own sex.  Thus, some dinosaurs turned into males, screwed some Lady Dino's, and made eggs. Now they have control of...what... 2 islands, is it? "they'll find a way"
"they'll find a way"--> DNA is not to be fucked around with. 

In my opinion, God 'programmed' his creations as to where if they are used in someone's proccess to play God, they self-destruct in a way. Not bomb- or explosion-wise, but in a long-term situation.  God will not control free will, but he will warn. Going back to the turkey, this is an example of a sign. If we choose to ignore signs, it will be but only our own faults. We chose to be ignorant and selfish. We will serve our punishment.

I, myself, don't know what the punishment will be...but it obviously won't be a good one.

For You "I disagree sooooooo much!!!" Commenters, atleast make it constructive and support it with somethin'. I'm open to all opinions.

Well y'see... me friend Angie e-mailed me yesterday for the first time in months. Now, I'm not sure if I like like her (she like likes me)  or if this is just some weird phase.  If it is a phase, it'd better pass by quickly. >.o

Well, besides my weird...weirdness, things are goin' pretty smoothly. My mom's started night shifts, so I see her more now. And my sister isn't having as many tantrums (she's still having too many, though :P)

Aaaand...yeah. nothing new! WEE

Yeah, so I did fanart for my character...which Bal made up, even though the hat style and name are from .hack// .... yanno what? I'm gonna stop trying to explain.

http://img92.imageshack.us/img92/5373/shugodoug25qi.png

Adore it.

Well, I'm less unhappy now. Time seems to be going by faster.

The candle is still in front of me.

I got bored and cutomized my LJ...um....thing. ^^;

And now I feel like drawing...

"Well let's just see how jealous she'll get when I start stalkin' Alanis Morissette!"

Well, 'Date Movie' was fun(ny). Some of it was overdone, but some like their steak like that.

Woke up this morning to my cellphone at 8:00. Once I got done talking to the dude on the ther end, I went into the bathroom and <scratched out>, but when I was washing my hands, my glorious sister woke up and yelled at her daughters/my nieces to "Put down the god damn candy." -.-
So I went into my room and blasted some .hack// music. Yeah... music is my only way I can 'protest'.

So then I went to the computer at about 8:30 and signed into HHQ. Apparantly it was Hamstar, RF, AND erti who were the posers...heh. Me and Bal (we didn't decide this together, we just both happened to) are guessing that this was a way to copy our "Phase" demo at HHQ last summer...long story.

And I signed on to YIM today, to find that Victor doesn't want to sit by us anymore. It's understandable. Everyone in our 'group' treats him like an asshole just because he likes the military...a lot. I still don't forgive Ian for his "I'm better then Victor, let's shove it in his face" shit...

Damn...I'm beginning to cry.

Yeah, so not much of anything new has been happening lately. Haven't drawn anything new, haven't done anything new (except HW), but I have eaten. And that is cool.

Oh yeah. I cleaned my room and now it's all shiny and crap. Just need ta organize my bookshelf and get my posters up.

There's a candle in front of me.


Breagh wasn't at school today.
Aaron's being all short and annoying.
The A-girl's been all bored n crap, even though she spoke to her A-man. However, her sister IS suicidal...so I'm backing off.
Victor's trying to start his DC shit again...oh joy.
Ian won't leave Victor alone and was an ass last lunch. Go figure.

And RF or Hamz or whoever (likely RF) are posing as a hacker at HHQ and annoying people. Heh. Atleast it gives us something to do.

whatever, though. Penguins will be penguins.

BTW, I'm leaving in just a lil' bit to watch 'Date Movie' with some buds...ya...

Ten Top Trivia Tips about Shugo!

  1. Over half of Americans are officially Shugo.
  2. Shugo cannot jump.
  3. The opposite sides of Shugo always add up to seven!
  4. Koalas sleep for 22 hours a day, two hours more than Shugo.
  5. Forty percent of the world's almonds and twenty percent of the world's peanuts are used in the manufacture of Shugo.
  6. It is bad luck to light three cigarettes with the same Shugo.
  7. It's bad luck to whistle near Shugo.
  8. Some people in Malaysia bathe their babies in beer to protect them from Shugo.
  9. All of the roles in Shakespeare's plays - including the female roles - were originally played by Shugo.
  10. US gold coins used to say 'In Shugo we trust'!

This morning while I was drawing (I got a new pad X3) I saw some guy riding his unicycle right past my house. o.o

And I FINALLY freakin found out how to change Tommy V's look on GTA VC (PC version) x.x

Did I mention the unicycle man? o.o

I had a dream last night that I was running around a school (note that I've never been to this school in real life, but I have been in other dreams of mine) with some psycho alien teacher who I knew was trying to kill me, but she didn't know I knew (x.x). And I was in a robe o.o
Anywho, she tried pushing me down and elevator shaft, she tried stabbing me with pencils, she even tried locking me in a gymnasium to make me starve to death. But I kept the door from shutting each time. o.o
When I finally lost her after running through random school hallways, I went outside and sat on a bench in an outside bar. After I sat down, this one history major dude (he was about my age, wearing dark brown clothes) came over with the shotgun the weird teacher lady was holding. He said something like "This isn't very 'earthly'." Then he shot up at a piece of wood and it caught on fire. Then he shot again and the fire froze (got shot so much it actually froze o.o; ).
Then I said "Lemme see that." He handed the gun over to me and I went over to a glass wall and shot at it with the ice. It froze, then shattered. Then I tried it on the tip of my finger and my skin didn't freeze. I tried it again on my arm, and nothing happened. Then one of the guys I was sitting with came over and tried it on the right side of his face, and it became frozen...then his face shattered...that's when I woke up...
Also, near the beginning I was naked in class. That's why I was wearing the robe. And even earlier than that, I was helping a family find a good house to move into. And this house was located in one of the 5 or 6 random neighborhoods that I made up in one of my dreams. This one was the same neighborhood I had my 'omg, I'm being chased by Vampires and Ogres in someones freaking attic!' dream series (it actually lasted about 3 or 4 nights).

o.o And I got homework! Yay! What kind did I get, ye ask?

  • 2 Paragraphs on why or why not learning history is important.
  • 850 words on who my role model is.
The first was easy.
However, I didn't know who the hell my role model is, if I even have one for that matter (I'm weird, k? XP). In other words, that one didn't go so well. o.o;

Let's see...how about we check out what happened Friday?
  • I was late to school by 20 minutes. o.o;
  • I made it to (almost) all my classes on time! Yay!
  • I got another thing of homework. x_X  800 words on some story we read in class (I think...I'll have to check that again o.o;). But this time I get to take da beetle down with me! Bwahaha! >:D

So, yay for school.... o.o;

I had a dream last night that the house across the street blew up and FBI people came down to investigate. Then two neighbors for some reason came over to meh house for a BBQ, then (in my dream) I fell asleep, had a small dream about some girl sucking my toe (O.o), then woke up to find a tube in my bellybutton and my right nipple. I looked around and found the two neighbors...feeding on someone. Then me and meh mom somehow killed them o.o; The FBI people came over and thanked us, then went back to the house across the street.

The End?

Currently watching Jurassic Park III. It's not nearly as good as the original Jurassic Park, but, in my opinion, it's way better than The Lost World: Jurassic Park.

Oh, right: I've only had LJ since Feb of this year, not almost a year. I'm just slow like that U^_^

Looks like I've had an empty livejournal for almost a year...strange. 

Anywho, today's been really, how do I say, boring. As have been the past couple of weeks. 
Hamstar Headquarters (HHQ) has been unbelievably dead...I'm thinking that it may have something to do with all the changes. Like lately, people <including most admins> have been trying to get more members, more categories, and other crap.

Also a lot of rules have been added, including one that I find one quite important to the world of online-ness: No Roleplaying. I know I agreed to it, but I think that I made the wrong decision, to an extent. I agree that the stuff that could be an actual roleplay should go in the RPing section, but stuff like having a different personality of yours stealing cookies and running into a corner laughing maniacly (long story) shouldn't be a part of that rule. In fact, I'm not even sure if it is. U^_^ But just saying.

Then there's Balmung-San...I love him like a brother, but gah... @.@ Whenever I try leaving either to either watch tv, play a game, read, draw, or practically do anything else he 'commands' for me to stay or 'be back in an hour or two'...I'm really close to shoving a pine tree up his ass and using him as the angel on the christmas tree. Balmung, please, just let me live on my own. I already have a dad, I don't need another...especially one younger than me. This may seem cruel, but that's how I work.

So...what else should I say...? Hmm...right.

There's something that happens when I'm bored for a long time. Either I get really psychotic, or I just have no real expression...like I don't smile, I don't cry, I don't get a pissed face...I'm just emotionless. Weird, eh? Perhaps, perhaps not.

Well, that's all for now...cuz I'm too bored to go on.
